name: crafting-efficiency
title: Crafting Efficiency
author: usafphoenix
description: Adds technologies to increase yield of recipes. Requires omniLib. Auto-updates entities on all surfaces with the updated recipes when research completes. This features is thanks to OmniLib, which is now required. Now with more-efficient recipes for items, mega-base production levels can be achieved in smaller footprints. To benefit from steel efficiency, bob's furnaces are required (or a furnace that adds a recipe picker. But to prevent Overpoweredness, bob's option of steel smelting cost reduction should be disabled.)
